title: MD.11 Tag
description: Tag entity - A Tag that can be generated and attached to a Lot. A Tag can be printed and physically connected to the Lot, in any form of packaging that is used.

identifier.description: Tag Id - Unique ID of the tag (can be expressed visually as QR code, barcode, numeric)

issuer.description: MD.04 Business Entity - The organization that issued the tag

issueDate.description: Date of Issue - Date when the tag was created

issueTime.description: Time of Issue - Time when the tag was created. ISO 8601 extended time format hh:mm[:ss] with optional zone designator

representativeRMB.description: The representative of RMB who approved, as name (string)

tagType.description: Type of tag - numeric, QR code, etc
